long_description:
From mid-fall to mid-spring, the Wine Country enters a beautiful time known as Cabernet Season. During these months, away from the hustle and bustle of the hectic summer months, Napa Valley has a chance to rest and revive. Once the grapes on the vast, rolling vineyards have been harvested, there is a calm that takes over. Mild temperatures create the perfect weather for short, outdoor adventures. While, the interiors become cozy and comfortable for the winter months. The entire region enters a peaceful stage of rest. It is a time for a cozy getaway, such as a retreat to The Wine Country Inn in St. Helena. Cabernet Season is a time for snuggling up by the warm fireplace while sipping on blends of wintry red wines. It is a time for hearty fare after spending some adventures out in nature. Come join us during this magical time of year in Napa Valley!

Find out more about all of the wonderful activities and attractions near The Wine Country Inn when you download our free Vacation Guide. It’s full of the best recommendations for things to see and do year-round as well as during Cabernet Season.

Winter Wine Tastings

Cabernet Season would not truly be complete without, well, a glass of Cabernet Sauvignon. Enjoy some winter wine tastings at one of our many surrounding wineries and vineyards. This is the perfect way to spend your romantic retreat to The Wine Country Inn! A glass of wine with some charcuterie is the perfect treat to enjoy during your vacation. Take advantage of the local Winter in the Wineries Passport during your Cabernet Season stay. With this, you will gain access to 15 wine tastings any time between Dec. 3 and Feb. 4. This is ideal for repeat visits to The Wine Country Inn! With this passport, you will also receive boutique and shopping discounts.

The Wine Country Inn Romance Special

Get cozy with your sweetheart with a private tasting or save the romance for an evening here at The Wine Country Inn. We offer a wonderful Romance Special that includes a chilled split of sparkling wine. You will also receive local chocolates and a rose petal turn-down awaiting your guest room. This special also includes two 60-minute classic Swedish spa treatments to melt away your tension. This is the perfect way to show your loved one you care and to celebrate a relaxing getaway together.

Snuggle Up at The Wine Country Inn

The perfect Cabernet Season retreat is at our luxurious resort among the vineyards and mountains of St. Helena, CA. After the excitement of Harvest Season has come to a calm, you can really take in the serenity of our beautiful area. At The Wine Country Inn, you can select a private cottage for a romantic getaway or choose a room in our Vineyard, Cascade, or Winery Houses. All our accommodations include luxurious amenities. Enjoy some massage therapy to release all your unwanted tension, and indulge in a delicious breakfast each morning of your stay.  We want to make your Cabernet Season stay the most delightful it can possibly be! Book your Cabernet Season stay in advance and receive up to 25% off your stay!
